content: this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by crafty intentions 15 slip_stitch into next oc blo single_crochet 24 chain 6 turn skip 3 chain stitches double_crochet half trip treble_crochet x 8 half trip x 8 double_crochet x 4 half_double_crochet x 4 single_crochet sl st in next oc 16 blo single_crochet 27 chain 4 turn skip 3 chain st double_crochet in chain st half trip treble_crochet x 10 half trip x 5 double_crochet x 5 half_double_crochet x 4 single_crochet x 2 slip_stitch into next available oc then single_crochet in last 3 available oc slip_stitch into next single_crochet stitch to fasten_off weave in ends black butterfly body use g or h hook black worsted weight yarn make 2 1 chain 20 turn skip 2 chain stitches half_double_crochet 2 in next chain stitch half_double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 4 in the last chain stitch continue around to the other side of the chain and half_double_crochet 16 opposite the first half_double_crochet 16 you made half_double_crochet 2 in last chain stitch same stitch that has the first 2 half_double_crochet in it sl stitch into first half_double_crochet that you made fasten_off with 24 tail use the tail to stitch this butterfly body into place place one of these on either side of the center of the rainbow piece as though you are making a butterfly sandwich stitch into place through the rainbow piece to create a black center butterfly body leave the antennae poking out page | 10 © 2017 megan lapp all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be and pattern by crafty intentions
